20101222070138.000|20101222070140.000|CC1|OUR AREA, YOU'RE GOING TO START

20101222070516.000|20101222070519.000|CC1|ABSOLUTE NIGHTMARE.             
20101222070519.000|20101222070523.000|CC1|CHRIS SCHAUBLE IS LIVE WHERE ONE
20101222070523.000|20101222070525.000|CC1|CAR IS NOT GOING ANYWHERE       
20101222070525.000|20101222070526.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THIS STORM.

20101222070527.000|20101222070529.000|CC1|WAS CRUSHED RIGHT AROUND 8:30   
20101222070529.000|20101222070529.000|CC1|THIS MORNING.                   
20101222070529.000|20101222070534.000|CC1|I AM STANDING IN THE BRANCHES OF
20101222070534.000|20101222070534.000|CC1|A HUGE TREE.                    
20101222070534.000|20101222070537.000|CC1|THEY CRUSHED THIS SUV RIGHT     
20101222070537.000|20101222070537.000|CC1|HERE.                           
20101222070537.000|20101222070539.000|CC1|BUT THE NEIGHBORS SAY, YOU KNOW 
20101222070539.000|20101222070540.000|CC1|WHAT, THEY NEVER NOT IT WOULD BE
20101222070540.000|20101222070541.000|CC1|A PROBLEM.

20101222070542.000|20101222070544.000|CC1|TEN YEARS AND THEY ALWAYS SAID

20101222070552.000|20101222070556.000|CC1|BRANCHES ON THIS OLD TREE IN THE
20101222070556.000|20101222070559.000|CC1|FAIRFAX DISTRICT FINALLY GAVE   
20101222070559.000|20101222070602.000|CC1|WAY, CRUSHING THE SUV.          
20101222070602.000|20101222070604.000|CC1|>> I CAME OUT AND SAW THAT THE  
20101222070604.000|20101222070608.000|CC1|TREE HAD FALLEN ON TOP OF THIS  
20101222070608.000|20101222070608.000|CC1|CAR.

20101222070622.000|20101222070623.000|CC1|COME DOWN.

20101222070627.000|20101222070628.000|CC1|THE OUT-OF-BALANCE.

20101222070630.000|20101222070630.000|CC1|SIDE.

20101222070632.000|20101222070634.000|CC1|IN FACT, I THINK I'M GOING TO   
20101222070634.000|20101222070635.000|CC1|HAVE MY SON SLEEP ON THE OTHER  
20101222070635.000|20101222070636.000|CC1|SIDE WITH ME TONIGHT.           
20101222070636.000|20101222070637.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN THE SAN FERNANDO
20101222070637.000|20101222070639.000|CC1|VALLEY, THIS SINKHOLE OPENED UP 
20101222070639.000|20101222070641.000|CC1|IN WOODLAND HILLS.              
20101222070641.000|20101222070642.000|CC1|ALL FOUR LANES CLOSED IN THE    
20101222070642.000|20101222070644.000|CC1|SECTION OVER THE L.A. RIVER.    
20101222070644.000|20101222070647.000|CC1|IN SUNLAND, CYNTHIA LEMONS FEARS
20101222070647.000|20101222070649.000|CC1|FOR THE STABILITY OF HER MOBILE 
20101222070649.000|20101222070652.000|CC1|HOME AND ITS PRECARIOUS HILLSIDE
20101222070652.000|20101222070652.000|CC1|PERCH.                          
20101222070652.000|20101222070653.000|CC1|>> MY HOUSE IS FALLING DOWN THE 
20101222070653.000|20101222070654.000|CC1|HILL.                           
20101222070654.000|20101222070656.000|CC1|>> Reporter: AFTER TOMORROW'S   
20101222070656.000|20101222070657.000|CC1|COMMUTE, KENNY MORRIS, BEST     
20101222070657.000|20101222070700.000|CC1|KNOWN AS MR. TRAFFIC ON SIRIUS  
20101222070700.000|20101222070702.000|CC1|XM RADIO, SAID LEAVE AN HOUR    
20101222070702.000|20101222070704.000|CC1|EARLIER THAN NORMAL AND SLOW    
20101222070704.000|20101222070704.000|CC1|DOWN.                           
20101222070704.000|20101222070706.000|CC1|>> YOU'RE NOT ALLOWED TO DO THE 
20101222070706.000|20101222070707.000|CC1|SPEED LIMIT IN THE RAIN.        
20101222070707.000|20101222070709.000|CC1|YOU HAVE TO BE GOING AT LEAST   
20101222070709.000|20101222070712.000|CC1|FIVE TO TEN MILES SLOWER THAN   
20101222070712.000|20101222070713.000|CC1|WHAT THE SIGN SAYS ON THE CITY  
20101222070713.000|20101222070715.000|CC1|STREET, OR EVEN ON THE FREEWAYS.
20101222070715.000|20101222070717.000|CC1|THE HEAVIER THE RAIN IS, THE    
20101222070717.000|20101222070718.000|CC1|SLOWER YOU WANT TO GO.          
20101222070718.000|20101222070720.000|CC1|>> Reporter: NOW, MR. TRAFFIC   
20101222070720.000|20101222070722.000|CC1|SAYS IF YOU HAVE THE OPTION OF  
20101222070722.000|20101222070724.000|CC1|WORKING FROM HOME TOMORROW, DO  
20101222070724.000|20101222070724.000|CC1|SO.                             
20101222070724.000|20101222070726.000|CC1|IT WILL BE SAFER FOR YOU, AND   
20101222070726.000|20101222070727.000|CC1|EVERYONE ELSE.                  
20101222070727.000|20101222070728.000|CC1|ONE LESS VEHICLE ON THE ROAD.   
20101222070728.000|20101222070733.000|CC1|AS FOR THE HUGE TREE, DEPARTMENT
20101222070733.000|20101222070735.000|CC1|OF TREE SERVICES IS EXPECTED TO 
20101222070735.000|20101222070737.000|CC1|COME OUT AND HELP REMOVE THE    
20101222070737.000|20101222070738.000|CC1|MASSIVE BRANCH ALSO IN THE NEXT 
20101222070738.000|20101222070740.000|CC1|COUPLE OF DAYS, IF THEY'RE NOT  
20101222070740.000|20101222070742.000|CC1|TOO BUSY DEALING WITH OTHER     
20101222070742.000|20101222070744.000|CC1|FALLEN TREES.                   
20101222070744.000|20101222070745.000|CC1|CHRIS SCHAUBLE, CHANNEL 4 NEWS. 
20101222070745.000|20101222070827.000|SEG|Type=Story
20101222070745.000|20101222070748.000|CC1|>>> A LOT OF PEOPLE HAVE STORIES
20101222070748.000|20101222070749.000|CC1|TO TELL.
